mapper.select: SELECT id, create_date AS createDate, modify_date AS modifyDate, data_status AS dataStatus, house_id AS houseId, member_id AS memberId, user_id AS userId, type, operation_type AS operationType FROM dj_design_quantity_room WHERE house_id = 803071991552462681019 AND type = 0 AND data_status = 0 ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1;
